doc.author: duanximeng
doc.description: 自建电路使用情况报表

sql.name: buildselfcircuitusingsituationmonthlyreportpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: buildselfcircuitusingsituationmonthlyreport.group
buildselfcircuitusingsituationmonthlyreport.left
sql.item: select trim('省际电路2M') from dual union all select trim('省际电路155M') from dual union all select trim('省际电路2.5G') from dual union all select trim('省际电路10G') from dual union all select trim('省内长途电路2M') from dual union all select trim('省内长途电路155M') from dual union all select trim('省内长途电路2.5G') from dual union all select trim('省内长途电路10G') from dual union all select trim('省内本地/城域网电路2M') from dual union all select trim('省内本地/城域网电路155M') from dual union all select trim('省内本地/城域网电路2.5G') from dual union all select trim('省内本地/城域网电路10G') from dual union all select trim('自建电路合计2M') from dual union all select trim('自建电路合计155M') from dual union all select trim('自建电路合计2.5G') from dual union all select trim('自建电路合计10G') from dual

sql.name: buildselfcircuitusingsituationmonthlyreport.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('省际电路2M'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000004),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省际电路155M'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000005),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省际电路2.5G'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000006),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省际电路10G'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000007),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内长途电路2M'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000009),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内长途电路155M'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000010),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内长途电路2.5G'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000011),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内长途电路10G'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000012),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内本地/城域网电路2M'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000013),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内本地/城域网电路155M'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000014),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内本地/城域网电路2.5G'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000015),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省内本地/城域网电路10G'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000016),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('自建电路合计2M'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000019),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('自建电路合计155M'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000020),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('自建电路合计2.5G'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000021),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('自建电路合计10G'),t.c802000002 as 部门,nvl(sum(t.c802000022),0) as sum from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
